full_text: Companies are passing along higher costs to consumers—for now. “I don’t think anyone knows what the word transitory is really going to turn out to mean.” https://t.co/kms2ZJ4XnS

localize.full_text: 企業は今のところ、コストアップ分を消費者に還元しています。"一過性の言葉が本当は何を意味するのか、誰にもわからないと思います。" https://t.co/kms2ZJ4XnS
